author: Isabelcastillo Buzzfeed Staff
title: 4 Genius Mason Jar Upgrades That You Should Be Using In Your Kitchen
text: Emily Shwake / BuzzFeed / Nifty ID: 10584811 1. Blend your smoothie directly in your mason jar by screwing the blade piece onto the jar. Cleaning this monstrosity is not worth the hassle. The blade fits neatly onto your jar. Blend directly into your cup. BuzzFeed / Nifty ID: 10584444 2. Cut out the spout of a juice carton to replace the inside piece mason jar lid. Flatten your carton and trace out the spout using the mason jar's lip. Cut it out with a box cutter. Top it off and screw on the lip. BuzzFeed / Nifty 3. Drill holes in a lid to grate, contain, and serve your cheese. Use a ⅛-inch drill bit. Sand down the edges a bit. Rub cheese onto the lid to grate it into your mason jar. Flip the lid in to use your grater as a shaker. BuzzFeed / Nifty 4. Shake cocktails, then swap for a lid with holes to pour. Shake your cocktail with a closed lid (obviously). In a second lid, make holes with a ⅛-inch drill bit and sand them down. Switch lids to pour your drink. BuzzFeed / Nifty
